xbrlcore.instance
Class InstanceUnit

java.lang.Object
  xbrlcore.instance.InstanceUnit
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class InstanceUnit
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

This class represents a unit of an instance file as it is described in the XBRL 2.1 Specification which can be obtained from http://www.xbrl.org/SpecRecommendations/.

Author:
Daniel Hamm
See Also:

Method Detail

equals

public boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
Determines whether two units are the same. They are the same if and only if
- they have the same id
- they have the same value
- they share the same namespace

Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object
Parameters:
obj - InstanceUnit object which is compared to this object.
Returns:
true if both objects are equal, otherwise false.
